mita amatharawa kumbaukkana wana rakshithaya ha bakmitiyawa – thibirigolla wana rakshithaya eli peheli karamin waga bim wyaptha kirima da sidu keremin pawathi.wawniyawa disthi්rakkaye pihiti suwisheshi wanantharayak wana karunkalipuram wana rakshithaye akkara 5000 k pamana pa්radeshayak sampurnayenma eli peheli kara shi්ra lanka mahawali adhikariya, siwil aarakshaka departhamenthuwa ha yudha hamudawa ek wi janathawa padinchi kirime katayuthu sidu kere. 1940 juni 7 wana dina anka 8620 darana gasat niwedanaya mangin ha pasuwa 1985 okthombar 15 wana dina 371/7 darana gasat niwedanaya mangin nawatha rakshithayak bawata pa්rakashayata path kala mema wana rakshithaye mulu bhumi pa්ramanaya hektayara 8432 kaki.

wideshiya dharma dutha katayuthu sandahama mema pirisa pawidi kala athara wisheshayen indiyawe dharmadutha katayuthu sandaha mihindu maha rahathan wahansege namaya athulath kota maha mahinda jathyanthara dharma dutha sangamaya namin ema pirisa bandawa ganna ladi.mema pirisen prathama kandayama 1967 pebarawari masadi dambaadiwata pitathkara hari athara, naluwela aananda himiyan 1967 agosthu 24 wana dina dambaadiwata pitath kara harina ladi.mema pirisata nakkawita sugathawansha himiyanda athulath wiya.

surawira yana mahathwarun athulu madawachchiya pradeshaye prabala eksath jathika paksha kriyakarihu pirisak eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya ha ekwethi.madawachchiya sangili kanadarawa pradeshaye pawathi (17) uthurumada palath sabha mathiwaranayata adala eksath janatha nidahas sandhana pracharaka raswimakadi hitapu maha amathi barti premalal disanayaka mahatha wetha bulath hurulu piliganwa mema pirisa mese sandhanaya ha ekwuha.eksath jathika pakshaya dinen dina pirihimata lakwana bawath, ewani pakshayaka randi sitima anuwanakamak pamanakma nowa lajjawata hethuwak bawath sandhanayata ekwu pirisa kiya sitiyaha.ratata samaya udakara dun janadhipathithuma sidukarana sanwardhanaya daka daka ejapayata wi nihandawa sitiya nohaki bawath, ee sandaha sahayogaya dakwima yuthukamak se kalpana kala nisa mema piyawara gath bawa owun pawasathi.eksath jathika pakshayata rate aandu balaya ganima pamanak nowa, palath sabhawaka ho pradeshiya sabhawaka balaya himikara ganima da sihinayak bawa owuhu kiya sitiyaha..
